meta.title: Technical Pre-Assessment Request | AFA Energy Romania
meta.description: Request an independent technical pre-assessment for your renewable energy project in Romania. ATR analysis, grid feasibility, and bankability assessment.

hero.title: Technical Pre-Assessment Request
hero.subtitle: Review the validation flows below and fill out the form to have your project's technical feasibility independently assessed. Initial response within 48 hours.

serviceCompass.title: Service Compass
serviceCompass.subtitle: Identify the right technical validation path based on your project's phase.
serviceCompass.description: AFA Energy Romania, positioned on the investor side, offers three core validation flows. Each flow is structured according to your project's maturity level and data availability.

flows.title: Path A — Technical Due Diligence (TDD)
flows.subtitle: Pre-acquisition stress test of design, equipment, and cost assumptions against bank-grade standards.

steps.title: Data Collection and Scope Definition
steps.description: Project file is received; single-line diagram, equipment list, energy yield simulation, and cost assumptions are evaluated.
details: Energy yield simulation and performance assumptions

steps.title: Technical Analysis and Red-Flag Identification
steps.description: Design choices, equipment compatibility, and cost reality are analyzed using the ATR Matrix™ methodology.

steps.title: Report and Negotiation Input
steps.description: Technical findings summary, reasoned note on cost assumptions, and technical protection recommendations for contract negotiations are delivered.

flows.title: Path B — ATR & Grid Analysis
flows.subtitle: Technical analysis of grid connection conditions and validation of connection timeline against the investment plan.

steps.title: ATR Document and Grid Data Review
steps.description: ATR document or application pack, DSO/TSO correspondence, and connection assumptions are reviewed.

steps.title: Capacity and Curtailment Analysis
steps.description: Export capacity constraints and curtailment likelihood are assessed on a technical scenario basis.

steps.title: Technical Roadmap
steps.description: ATR feasibility assessment, critical checkpoints, and a technically focused roadmap are delivered.

flows.title: Path C — Regulatory & Permit Audit
flows.subtitle: Hierarchical control of ANRE regulatory compliance and permit flow for investment security.

steps.title: Permit Inventory and Status Assessment
steps.description: Current permit list, land-use status, and environmental permitting processes are reviewed.
details: Permit list and current status summary

steps.title: Consistency Check and Risk Map
steps.description: Permit flow consistency is verified; document gaps and risk concentration points are identified.

steps.title: Permit Roadmap
steps.description: An investor-ready, trackable permit roadmap with checkpoints is delivered.

afaDifference.title: The AFA Difference
paragraphs: AFA Energy Romania does not act as a project developer, EPC contractor, O&M provider, or equipment vendor.
Our revenue model is advisory-fee based, not commission-based. This structure supports investor-side, impartial technical assessments.
Each engagement is structured based on data maturity and scope; final deliverable format and scope are defined in the written proposal and service agreement.

step3.title: Data Availability
step3.dataLabel: Are technical data (Yield, Grid Study) available?

thankYou.title: Request Received
thankYou.message: Your technical pre-assessment request has been successfully submitted. Below are the next steps in the process.
steps: Your request will be reviewed by our technical team within 48 hours.
Pre-assessment scope and timeline will be shared via email.
Independent technical analysis will be initiated using the ATR Matrix™ methodology.
Final report and investment decision support will be delivered.
